page.title: 10HALL FARM LANGTOFT
page.content:
FARMING HALL FARM LANGTOFT
I live at Hall Farm my dad farms it.It is mostly arable but we've got a few sheep and bullocks.Bullocks are bulls which have been castarated they eat grass and produces beef.Beef is the meat that comes off a bullock.A sheep is an animal that also eats grass but this animal produces mutton this is meat off a sheep it has a different flavour and is a more tender meat.On our arable fields we grow cerials like winter wheat,spring barley,winter barley,potatoes,pea's and beans.Barley and wheat are a cerial crops with ears and straw. Beans and peas are plant that have pods.Potatoes are a root crop they grow round objects they are the potatoes.We've got four tractors and three trailers.A tractors is a machine
